'''The J.R.R. Tolkien Desk Calendar 1981''' was produced by [[Ballantine Books]] with illustrations by the [[Brothers Hildebrandt]].

* ISBN 0-345-29191-3
* Dimensions: 8 3/8 x 8 inches
* Plastic comb-bound
